If locationtion of element attribute is expressed, tagg it as BIOGRAPHY or WRITING PERSONNAME and available only within BIRTHNAME
. Within BirthName, it is placed last in Western usage, first in Chinese. It has one optional attribute, Reg, for the rare instances when a surname has two different spellings, and you need to use one that is contested or incorrect. In this case the Reg attribute supplies the proper form, and a ScholarNote should outline the discrepancy.
See PERSONNAME for general name practices. Enter SURNAME after all given names. Do not punctuate. If the birth surname is unknown, delete tag and explain in ScholarNote.
